text: Kaya he loka dharativara hindale phirale nahita ki tyanni pahile asate ki je loka yancyapurvi ho'una geleta, tyanca anta kasa jhala. Vastavika te loka yancyapeksa adhika saktisali hote. Ani akasammadhye va dharativara asi konatihi vastu nahi ji allahala lacara karila. To sarva kahi jananara, motha samarthyasali ahe
